Author: plinkplonk
Content: deploying a working system is a "success story" worthy of being written up ? I have a hundred or so "success stories" to tell.  :-P

Author: staunch
Content:
Every time you find yourself/someone else disappointed with something, or unable to do something, instead of thinking "That's just how things are I suppose" ask yourself "Could I fix this situation if I really tried?"

Write the ideas down. Look over your list. Pick the one that seems the most interesting AND has the best (clearest/easiest) method of distribution.

Author: staunch
Content: That was like reading a dating site profile for Brad Pitt.\n

Author: pixcavator
Content: "Extrapolation is the process of constructing new data points outside a discrete set of known data points."
